Sentencas: Sr- and Mn-doped LaGaO(3) (La(0.8)Sr(0.2)Ga(0.5)Mn(0.5)O(3-delta), LSGMn) has been synthesized using a glycine nitrate combustion method.
Titulo: Strontium- and Manganese-Doped Lanthanum Gallate as a Potential Anode Material for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Powder X-ray diffraction examinations show that the synthesized LSGMn has a pure single cubic perovskite phase.
Titulo: Strontium- and Manganese-Doped Lanthanum Gallate as a Potential Anode Material for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Four-probe direct current conductivity characterization indicates that the conductivity of the sintered LSGMn in wet H(2) is lower than that in air, whereas the activation energy in wet H(2) is higher than that in air.
Titulo: Strontium- and Manganese-Doped Lanthanum Gallate as a Potential Anode Material for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Such an expected p-type conduction mechanism is the result of the valence change of Mn, which enables LSGMn to be a mixed ionic and electronic conductor.
Titulo: Strontium- and Manganese-Doped Lanthanum Gallate as a Potential Anode Material for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Using LSGMn as an anode and LSCF as a cathode, the peak power density at 800 degrees C of the LSGM electrolyte supported all-perovskite cells can reach 460 mW/cm2 using wet H(2) as fuel and ambient air as an oxidant.
Titulo: Strontium- and Manganese-Doped Lanthanum Gallate as a Potential Anode Material for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Further, LSGMn anode has showed reasonable sulfur tolerance in H(2)-containing 100 ppm H(2)S and the all-perovskite cell has demonstrated good performance stability in the short-term operation at a constant cell voltage of 0.7 V.
Titulo: Strontium- and Manganese-Doped Lanthanum Gallate as a Potential Anode Material for Intermediate-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
